basics.name: Guangrui Fan (樊光瑞)
basics.label: Lecturer | Ph.D. Candidate
basics.summary: Lecturer at Taiyuan University of Science and Technology and Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science at Universiti Malaya. Research interests include Human-Centered AI, AI in Education, AI-Mediated Communication & Trust, and fair spatiotemporal prediction.
